description.compact: The INIT event occurs after a Composer instance is done being initialized

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\EventDispatcher\Event instance.

description.compact: The COMMAND event occurs as a command begins

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Plugin\CommandEvent instance.

description.compact: The PRE_FILE_DOWNLOAD event occurs before downloading a file

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Plugin\PreFileDownloadEvent instance.

description.compact: The POST_FILE_DOWNLOAD event occurs after downloading a package dist file

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Plugin\PostFileDownloadEvent instance.

description.compact: The PRE_COMMAND_RUN event occurs before a command is executed and lets you modify the input arguments/options

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Plugin\PreCommandRunEvent instance.

description.compact: The PRE_POOL_CREATE event occurs before the Pool of packages is created, and lets you filter the list of packages which is going to enter the Solver

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Plugin\PrePoolCreateEvent instance.
